posts.content:
I have just had a very sad email from a lady who paid Â£10k deposit to All Classics of Leicester who promised to get a bus done up in SA and shipped over. Of course it never happened and despite a high court judgement the bailiffs were unable to locate him (the business premises were vacant and no sign of life). The guy is Mr Mungari and his partner in crime in SA is Vigil Bare.
Pass the word don't deal with them!
and if anyone has any leads on tracking him down or had similar bad experiences I am sure the lady would like to know...I wonder if the other SA company with a thread about dreadful workmanship on this forum is the same people?

Sad indeed David.

Listed on Companies House as 'active':

https://beta.companieshouse.gov.uk/company/08947586

https://beta.companieshouse.gov.uk/offi ... pointments

yes and I also found that the guy has run and dissolved a lot of non VW businesses from the same address over past 8 years! I bet he owes loads of money to various people but has weaseled out using the dissolved company scam....
It's a shame the lady did not ask around in VW circles as there are plenty of reputable people who import and have been doing so for a long time that she could have been pointed to.

Mmmm - yes - the dissolved company scam.... I have to agree with you there David.

It shouldn't be allowed. Once a scammer, always a scammer methinks.

I notice also still advertising on car & classic also, and active website.

It's a sad fact that people will rip off other people all over the world. Not just in Africa


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
good work..I have informed the lady and suggested she contact that website about her issues!

Thank you for taken the time to look into All Classics and Terrence Munangi. I put an add out on here on the 20th Nov 2016 I'm Kezvilla. When I was looking into buying a campervan I had done some reach but had decided on All Classics UK Ltd as after meeting with Terrence Munangi and doing all back round checks there was know alarm bells. So sadly to my great regret I went ahead. But thanks to people like yourself helping spread the word and my story being shared on Facebook and you tube that no one else will fall to the same fate as I have.
Thank you Kerry Adams

Information from Companies House shows a Director appointed (who had previously resigned) on the same date that Mr Munangi resigned.

https://beta.companieshouse.gov.uk/comp ... 6/officers

if he is a scammer he will be looking for the next victim...let it be you and set the trap! Baseball bats (or over there cricket bats), and a handful of masked buddies, before the police arrive just to subdue him.....

Yes kleinbusronnie and John Convery is a a friend in our local VW club over here in Northern Ireland, in fact I drive this van quite often as its used in their wedding hire business I think it was one of the 1st vans sold by all classics, John traveled over to see it before paying anything up front.
I had tried to contact him as well to buy a bay they had and still have advertised but they never got back to me.

Hello just seen this message about John is there anyway of contacting John Co very as would be very interested to speak with him. I need all the help and information about All Classics UK.

Thank you Kerry
PM me your phone number and I will pass it on to John
Hi my mobile number is ........... I do hope he does get in contact thank you Kerry

Hi Kezvilla.

Slippy8v probably asked you to PM your phone number so that it was not visible to everyone.

Might be worth doing that and deleting it from your post.
